validFor.description: The period for which this expectation is valid

name.description: A string used to give a name to the expectation

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update of this REST resource

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status of this expectation

statusChangeDate.description: A date time( DateTime). The date that the status changed to the current one

target.description: A list of target entities related to this expectation. A target defines to what instance or artifact the requirement and constraints are applicable

constraint.description: This is a list of constraint references applied to this expectation
